title: ATP World Tour Masters 1000 / WTA Premier, Madrid Masters Men's Singles Final Rounds and Seeds Progress
text: May 11, 2018 / 9:37 PM / Updated 34 minutes ago UPDATE 2-ATP World Tour Masters 1000 / WTA Premier, Madrid Masters Men's Singles Final Rounds and Seeds Progress Reuters Staff 6 Min Read May 12 (OPTA) - Final Rounds and Seeds Progress from the ATP World Tour Masters 1000 / WTA Premier, Madrid Masters Men's Singles matches on Friday ..
